attributes.mlflow.spanInputs: {"prompt": "Generate Cisco IOS XR 7.0.1 telemetry configuration to stream IPv6 Neighbor Discovery host addresses (host-addresses/host-address) and ND interface state. Use gRPC no TLS. Collector 192.0.2.182:57500. Sample every 30 seconds."}
attributes.mlflow.spanOutputs:
"telemetry model-driven
 sensor-group IPV6-ND-STATE
  sensor-path /ipv6-neighbor/host-addresses/host-address
  sensor-path /ipv6-neighbor/interfaces/interface/state
 !
 destination-group DG-GRPC
  address-family ipv4
   destination 192.0.2.182
    port 57500
    encoding self-describing-gpb
    protocol grpc no-tls
 !
 subscription SUB-IPV6-ND
  sensor-group-id IPV6-ND-STATE sample-interval 30000
  destination-group-id DG-GRPC
 !"
